abstract: The film director James Cameron said he was influenced by Popular Mechanics while growing up.
snippet: The film director James Cameron said he was influenced by Popular Mechanics while growing up.
lead_paragraph: 3:50 p.m. | Updated The death last week of Steven P. Jobs led some to wonder about the future of innovation in the United States. They need not worry, according to James Cameron, the film director whose movies like "Avatar" and "Titanic" have a gee-whiz element that is underpinned by science.
